content: complimentary pattern fall festival acorns design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202347 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted fall festival acorns design by bobbi intveld description knit acorns to accompany your knit leaves and pumpkins using just one fall festival bundle you can create colorful décor for everyone s favorite season experience level gauge in stockinette st 6 sts and 7 row = 1 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements 4 after stuffing one circumference 3 including stem height materials yarn needles 4mm double pointed needles or size needed woolstok worsted bundle size 6 to obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle fall festival color shown color shown no 1326 no 1309 mossy green earth ivy color shown color shown no 1302 no 1312 gravel road drift wood color shown color shown no 1303 no 1323 highland fleece ember glow color shown no 1311 rusted roof p 02 blue sky fibers other tools stuffing & tapestry needle notes pattern is written for solid acorn add color work as desired using photos as inspiration one mini hank will make one complete acorn step no 1 acorn acorn nut acorn cap with 1 dpn co 3 sts co 21 sts divide evenly onto 3 dpns slide sts to other end of needle k3 as if working k1 p1 3 times kfb 3 times 24 sts row 1 round 1 i-cord *p1 k1 repeat from * to end round 2 divide onto 3 dpns as follows 1st kfb 2nd round 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end round 3 kfb 3rd kfb 6 sts repeat last 2 rnds once more then round 2 one more time k round 3 *k1 p1 p2tog repeat from * to end 18 sts round 7 *k1 lli rli k1 repeat from * to end 12 sts round 4 *p1 k2tog repeat from * to end 12 sts round 8 k round 5 *p2tog repeat from * to end 6 sts round 9 * k1 lli k2 rli k1 repeat from * to end 18 sts round 6 *p2tog repeat from * to end 3 sts round 10 k round 7 place 3 sts on 1 dpn work 3 sts purl i-cord rnds 11-15 * k1 lli k4 rli k1 repeat from * to end 24 sts round 8 cut yarn using tapestry ndl thread end through rem k rnds 9-12 sts pull tight and tie off to secure weave in ends k these rnds will be under acorn cap change round 13 colors if desired *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 18 sts round 14 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end 12 sts round 15 *k2tog repeat from * to end 6 sts round 16 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts but do not close weave in ends if necessary inside nut stuff then pull to close p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step
